## ProgramBuilder.textureStore() method

Same as textureStore builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
textureStore(tex: PBShaderExp, coords: number | PBShaderExp, value: PBShaderExp): void;
```
